tool_description: Evaluates patient data against structured eligibility criteria to determine trial qualification status and identify specific inclusion/exclusion matches or violations.

inclusion_criteria.description: List of inclusion criteria to evaluate

exclusion_criteria.description: List of exclusion criteria to evaluate

patient_data.description: Structured patient clinical data for evaluation

manual_review_threshold.description: Confidence threshold below which manual review is flagged (0.0-1.0)

evaluation_date.description: Date for eligibility assessment in ISO 8601 format

error_messages: Missing required data: patient_data must contain sufficient clinical information for criteria evaluation.
Invalid criteria format: inclusion_criteria and exclusion_criteria must be non-empty arrays with valid criteria statements.
Confidence threshold error: manual_review_threshold must be between 0.0-1.0.
Evaluation date format: evaluation_date must be valid ISO 8601 date-time format.
Patient data parsing failed: Unable to extract necessary clinical parameters from patient_data.
usage: Provide patient_id, structured inclusion/exclusion criteria arrays, and patient clinical data. Configure strict_mode and manual_review_threshold as needed for evaluation sensitivity.

inclusion_results.description: Detailed results for each inclusion criterion

exclusion_results.description: Detailed results for each exclusion criterion
